title: Update executor to check epic completion after task execution
description: After a task completes, check if its parent epic is now complete. If so, add the 'needs-quality-gates' label to trigger the next phase of the workflow.
design:
Integration points:
1. In executor after task completion (processNextIssue)
2. Call GetMissionForTask() to find parent epic
3. Call IsEpicComplete() to check if complete
4. If complete: AddLabel(epicID, 'needs-quality-gates')
5. Log completion event to activity feed

Consider:
- Handle nested epics (phase within mission)
- Check all parent epics, not just immediate parent
- Graceful handling if no parent epic exists
acceptance_criteria:
- Executor checks epic completion after task success
- 'needs-quality-gates' label added when epic complete
- Handles nested epic hierarchies (phase â†’ mission)
- Logs completion events to activity feed
- No false positives (only marks complete epics)
- Integration tests verify end-to-end flow
- Works with existing executor shutdown/cleanup logic
